108.job_description: We help the world run better At SAP, we enable you to bring out your best. Our company culture is focused on collaboration and a shared passion to help the world run better. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from.About SAP Labs Network and SAP Labs Vietnam SAP Labs Network is the global R&D setup where over 55,000 engineers around the world create, operate and support the most innovative enterprise solutions for SAP’s customers worldwide. SAP Labs Vietnam aims to become one of the key locations within the SAP Labs Network to support the engineering growth for SAP.Meet the team At SAP Procurement Product Team, our mission is to provide the world's leading cloud-based spend management solution, unifying the SAP Procurement portfolio across SAP S/HANA, SAP Ariba Applications & Business Network, and SAP Fieldglass. To strengthen further our team, we are looking for a skilled Developer with Data Science background to work with the leading cloud infrastructure in SAP Procurement Engineering teams  What you will do  Responsible for Design, Development & testing of cloud native applications Participate in code reviews, write unit tests, and perform integration testing to maintain code quality and reliability Push the frontiers of what is possible in the area of GenAl, Al and machine learning, working with real data. Explore, understand, and implement the most recent machine learning algorithms and approaches. Responsible for creating prototypes involving machine learning models to address business problems Capable of performing tasks and take decisions independently and ensure completion of tasks with good quality, timely delivery & efficiency What you should bring  6-10 years of relevant industry experience in product development Expert proficiency in Java w.r.t Spring Framework, Hibernate, Web Technologies and handling of data structures, SQL scripts Experience and understanding of micro services architecture Experience with CI/CD Tooling and software delivery and bundling mechanisms Experience with version control tools such as Git, Github Understanding of test driven development (TDD) Relevant experiences in data modeling and using data analytical tools and techniques (e.g., Python, SQL, Hadoop, R, Data Bricks) Intermediate understanding of databases such as SAP HANA, SQL Server, or Oracle Familiarity with statistical models and data mining algorithms Familiar with agile development methodology #SAPLabsVietnamCareersBring out your best SAP innovations help more than four hundred thousand customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with two hundred million users and more than one hundred thousand employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, you can bring out your best.We win with inclusion SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world. SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability: Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability. Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor. Requisition ID: 397573 | Work Area: Software-Design and Development | Expected Travel: 0 - 10% | Career Status: Professional | Employment Type: Regular Full Time | Additional Locations: #LI-Hybrid.

109.job_description: Hồ Chí Minh  Full-timeWhat you will doDevelop and implement solutions to ensure privacy policies are correctly implemented. The implementations should advance compliance with legal forms of data use as well as support business use of data; Work to align advanced technologies and review technical implementation details and design documentation for new systems and features to ensure compliance with Privacy by Design principles from the first stages of development and ensure that the data use meets established regulatory compliance needs such as Decree 13/2023 & Decree 53/2022; Analyze, design and program software enhancements for new data streams with a goal of developing technical solutions and systems to help mitigate privacy vulnerabilities and prevent potential future privacy risks; Understanding the process of creating solid design, coding, testing and debugging as well as completing documentation and procedures for installation and maintenance interface user-facing privacy controls; Use access control, data anonymization, pseudonimization and encryption to develop systems that preserve and improve data privacy, data protection, data usability, performance and the integrity of the privacy solution; Performs regular privacy assessments of operational processes, identifying, and mitigating risks across the company through effective tools, training and guidance; Work cross with data science and analytics communities both within and outside of the organization.  What you will needDemonstrated working experience in software engineering fundamentals, ability to understand programming languages & perform operations on large datasets; Proven track record in designing, implementing, and maintaining privacy solutions; Competent in the interpretation of numeric data, an understanding of statistical principles; Data literacy: finding and managing data, cleansing data, manipulating data. Qualifications:  BS or MS degree in computer science, computer engineering, information systems, privacy engineering or related field of study; Excellent communication and presentation skills and the ability to effectively communicate designs, proposals, and results; Knowledge of applicable privacy regulations and frameworks (e.g. GDPR, NIST CSF, Decree 13/2023, Decree 53/2022); 2 years' experience focusing on data protection /privacy related design, security/privacy; CIPT or CIPM, other Privacy certifications a plus.

110.job: KỸ SƯ TRÍ TUỆ NHÂN TẠO & THỰC TẬP SINH
110.job_description: KỸ SƯ TRÍ TUỆ NHÂN TẠO  Bộ phận: Đổi mới Sáng tạo  Báo cáo: Giám đốc phòng Đổi mới Sáng tạo  Công việc chính:  Phát triển giải pháp GenAI/LLM cho lĩnh vực tài chính như phân tích tâm lý, OCR, Chatbot, v.v. Phát triển các thuật toán học tăng cường sâu, kiểm tra ngược và đánh giá để hiểu rõ về đầu tư và giao dịch Phát triển các giải pháp AI để phân khúc, phân nhóm và lập hồ sơ khách hàng Xử lý việc xử lý dữ liệu: thu thập và làm sạch dữ liệu lịch sử, cung cấp dữ liệu trực tiếp, kỹ thuật tính năng, v.v. Chuẩn bị API để tích hợp với các nền tảng khác như Web và Mobile app Tham gia xây dựng bảng điều khiển để trình bày dữ liệu thị trường, thông tin chi tiết về khách hàng, v.v. Hợp tác chặt chẽ với các nhóm khác để đảm bảo sự thành công của sản phẩm/tính năng Tự động hóa các nhiệm vụ và quy trình quan trọng cho nhóm khoa học dữ liệu Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo sự phân công của Trưởng phòng Đổi mới Người dùng.Yêu cầu công việc:  Bằng cử nhân về Khoa học Máy tính, Kỹ thuật Phần mềm hoặc lĩnh vực liên quan Có ít nhất 3 năm kinh nghiệm phát triển và triển khai các giải pháp AI Kinh nghiệm đã được chứng minh trong việc áp dụng AI để xây dựng sản phẩm và trường hợp sử dụng Kinh nghiệm thực tế về Pytorch, Python, Docker, LLM, v.v. Thành thạo MLOps, AWS, Cơ sở dữ liệu và SQL là một lợi thế Kỹ năng giao tiếp và cộng tác xuất sắc, có khả năng làm việc hiệu quả trong môi trường nhóm Thông thạo tiếng Anh, cả viết và nói.Quyền lợi:  Thời gian làm việc 5 ngày/tuần (Thứ Hai đến Thứ Sáu) Cơ hội thăng tiến, phát triển nghề nghiệp công bằng Thu nhập hấp dẫn, cạnh tranh Chính sách thưởng Cuối năm hấp dẫn Chế độ BHXH, BHYT, BHTN theo quy định của Bộ luật Lao động và Bảo hiểm sức khỏe cao cấp PVI theo quy định của Công ty Được hưởng 11 ngày nghỉ Lễ Tết theo quy định của Bộ luật Lao Động, 17 ngày phép năm theo quy định của Công ty, và thêm 1 ngày phép cho 5 năm làm việc Được tham gia hoạt động du lịch nghỉ dưỡng hàng năm của Công ty Được tham gia các hoạt động khác của Công ty: Thể thao, Ngày hội gia đình, Ngày hội thiếu nhi Được tham gia các chương trình đào tạo Công ty tài trợ: Đào tạo Kỹ năng mềm (kỹ năng giao tiếp, Mindset Transformation), Đào tạo kỹ năng chuyên môn (Cloud Security, DevSecOps, Microsoft Azure) Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp và năng động.Nơi làm việc:  Vietcap Securities Joint Stock Company Floor 19, Bitexco Financial Tower, 02 Hai Trieu Street, District 1, HCMC Email: job@vietcap.com.vn

111.job: [BAC] cộng tác viên - Thực tập viên
111.company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN ĐÀO TẠO VÀ TƯ VẤN BAC
111.job_description: So với những công ty hay tập đoàn đa quốc gia nổi tiếng, thì hiện nay những công ty startups được xem là “đất lành” của các bạn sinh viên nhờ môi trường năng động, cơ hội học hỏi, sáng tạo trong nhiều vai trò đa dạng với chế độ làm việc khá linh hoạt. Khởi nghiệp như một đơn vị đầu tiên và duy nhất đào tạo về phân tích nghiệp vụ phần mềm (BA – Business Analyst) tại Việt Nam, BAC đã dần được biết đến và công nhận trong ngành Công nghệ Thông tin (CNTT) nói chung và lĩnh vực BA nói riêng. Với nhu cầu mở rộng và phát triển, BAC mong muốn có cơ hội cùng làm việc với các bạn sinh viên yêu thích lĩnh vực Công nghệ Thông tin, qua đó, các bạn sẽ được trải nghiệm và học hỏi trong một môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện.  1. Vị trí BAC cần tuyển  3 cộng tác viên mảng Sales|Marketing 2 cộng tác viên về nội dung. 1 cộng tác viên hỗ trợ thực hiện các chương trình sự kiện  2. Mô tả công việc  Hỗ trợ Sales và Marketing Thực hiện các công việc chuyên môn và hỗ trợ nhân viên chính thức. Hỗ trợ thực hiện các chiến dịch truyền thông, Marketing Online và quảng bá thương hiệu công ty. Thực hiện lên nội dung marketing trên google, facebook, digital marketing online. Phụ trách nội dung và đưa các bài viết lên các diễn đàn. Tổ chức sự kiện, hội thảo hàng tháng/quý.  3. Đối tượng phù hợp tham gia  Sinh viên thuộc ngành CNTT tại các trường tại TP.HCM. Hoặc chuyên viên/ nhân viên trong mảng sales và marketing. Hoặc bất kì ai có đam mê về lĩnh vực CNTT.  4. Điều kiện tham gia là gì?  Bạn trẻ, nhiệt huyết và có đam mê trong lĩnh vực CNTT. Có chuyên môn, kinh nghiệm hoặc đam mê liên quan đến vị trí ứng tuyển. Bạn có trách nhiệm và không ngại thử thách trong công việc. Sẵn sàng học hỏi và sáng tạo những giá trị mới. 5. Vì sao nên chọn trung tâm BAC?  Với sứ mệnh đồng hành và cung cấp những chương trình đào tạo, dịch vụ và tư vấn tốt nhất cho những ai đam mê BA dựa trên 3 tiêu chí cốt lõi: trách nhiệm, tương trợ và hữu ích. Bạn sẽ cảm thấy tự hào khi góp phần đem đến những giá trị đích thực đến cho khách hàng và học viên. BAC – môi trường thân thiện và chuyên nghiệp: BAC luôn tôn trọng ý kiến của các thành viên, để bạn có thể thỏa sức sáng tạo trong công việc của mình cũng như đóng góp cho sự phát triển của công ty. Giờ giấc làm việc linh hoạt dựa trên thời gian của bạn. Bạn là một phần của nhóm và chúng tôi luôn hỗ trợ và lắng nghe những ý kiến, phản hồi của bạn trong suốt quá trình làm việc tại BAC. Và tất nhiên, tại BAC bạn sẽ được trải nghiệm, đào tạo và học hỏi nhiều hơn về BA cũng như các công việc chuyên môn có liên quan.  6. Thông tin ứng tuyển ➟ Các bạn quan tâm có thể CLICK ỨNG TUYỂN NGAY

112.job_description: Roche fosters diversity, equity and inclusion, representing the communities we serve. When dealing with healthcare on a global scale, diversity is an essential ingredient to success. We believe that inclusion is key to understanding people’s varied healthcare needs. Together, we embrace individuality and share a passion for exceptional care. Join Roche, where every voice matters.  The Position Your OpportunitiesRegularly monitor sales performance and follow up with the sales team for the leads and demands that generate from clinical departments Develop and implement marketing plans for the responsible product group. Planning and execute all activities related to the Disease Area in charge Drive Roche’s products through their lifecycle and supports their appropriate use, which includes but not limited to non-promotional and promotional activities and interactions in order to convey key clinical data and product information to HCPs such as face to face discussion with individual/group of HCPs, educational events, and advisory boards, sharing products’ merits with HCPs in a truthful, factual, up-to-date, fair and balanced manner by relevant evidence and data. Build a plan to develop and increase the level of understanding and awareness amongst HCPs for targeted product group Build and develop KOLs to engage and deliver the key messages. Will be responsible for detailing product group in charge actively to ensure HCPs understand the role of Diagnostics and the intended uses of assays. Plan and implement the Group presentation to targeted clinicians Coordinate with PMs to roll-out the MKT plan including organizing Regional/ National congresses Who you are  Education and Qualification:  Have a bachelor in Medical, Pharmacy, Biotech, Life Science or relevant industry. Minimum 3 year experience in Sales in Multinational companiesOther skills & abilities  Effective communication skill Good interpersonal skill Creative problem solving and negotiation skill Customer complaint handling skill Goo time management skill Who we areAt Roche, more than 100,000 people across 100 countries are pushing back the frontiers of healthcare. Working together, we’ve become one of the world’s leading research-focused healthcare groups. Our success is built on innovation, curiosity and diversity.Roche is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

113.company: Bất Động Sản Danh Khôi Á Châu
113.job_description: MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆCTham gia xây dựng & phát triển các thiết kế cho thương hiệu và dự án của công ty. Triển khai các công việc thiết kế theo đúng thông tin, hình ảnh và mục tiêu marketing đã được phê duyệt. Đảm bảo chất lượng hình ảnh, chính xác trong thiết kế và các vật phẩm quảng cáo. Luôn cập nhật xu hướng thiết kế. Thiết kế các ấn phẩm quảng cáo cho các chương trình marketing bán hàng, sự kiện mở bán... (Brochure, tờ rơi, standee, backdrop...). Thiết kế các sản phẩm truyền thông online như banner GDN, Facebook, popup, thư mời online...cho các chương trình truyền thông, sự kiện bán hàng và các hoạt động marketing khác... Phối hợp với leader, chuyên viên PR... để cho ra hình ảnh tốt nhất về dự án và hoạt động của công ty. Cập nhật xu hướng thiết kế mới nhất về ngành BĐS để cho ra ý tưởng thiết kế hấp dẫn. Hỗ trợ các thành viên trong Phòng marketing trong tất cả các hoạt động khác của phòng.YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆCTốt nghiệp cao đẳng trở lên chuyên ngành thiết kế đồ họa Ít nhất 02-03 năm vị trí chuyên viên thiết kế, cụ thể thiết kế POSM, thiết kế các sản phẩm chạy trên nền tảng digital: Facebook,Google Display Network, hoặc nhiều hơn thế; Có kinh nghiệm thiết kế cho Agency, Bất động sản, tài chính, chứng khoán, ngân hàng, bảo hiểm là một lợi thế; Đam mê sáng tạo, có ý tưởng tốt, có gu thẩm mỹ, bắt kịp xu thế thiết kế hiện đại là một lợi thế; Thành thạo các phần mềm đồ họa Photoshop/AI.... CƠ HỘI VÀ QUYỀN LỢILương : 18-24 triệu/tháng Thưởng khác: thưởng quý, tháng 13++, thưởng tết, lễ, sinh nhật, cưới hỏi… Ký HĐLĐ, tham gia BHXH, BHYT, BHTN theo luật định Du lịch hàng năm trong và ngoài nước. Các chế độ phúc lợi khác: khám sức khỏe, may đồng phục, 12 ngày phép/năm, nghỉ lễ theo luật định, làm việc 44h/tuần.  THÔNG TIN LIÊN HỆ Công Ty Cổ Phần DKRA Group Trụ sở làm việc: 63-67 An Điềm, Phường 10, Quận 5, Tp. HCM Điện thoại: 0888.04.8228 Email: tuyendung@dkra.vn Website: www.dkra.vn

114.job_description: Help achieve our purpose: Feeding the FutureNutreco is a pioneer in animal nutrition and aquafeed – and our purpose of Feeding the Future is our passion. Through it, we’re shaping a sustainable future for food production globally. As part of the SHV family, our business lines, Skretting and Trouw Nutrition, are revolutionizing aquaculture and advancing livestock health and productivity with innovative solutions that are breaking new ground in the industry. There’s no better place to kickstart your career!The opportunity Drive your future success in end-to-end supply chain by learning from some of the industry’s foremost experts in sustainability, procurement, quality, manufacturing, logistics, planning and engineering. Work at the Centre of it all and build your international acumen by connecting with our Business Units and Global Supply Chain Leadership Team – the central interface between production, R&D, sales and our customers. Gain practical experience in supply chain excellence by working on challenging tasks, projects and completing numerous trainings in an international environment.Young Professional Program description We offer a special 18-month program, split into three six-month rotations on the job, normally in three different countries, in three different supply chain areas. The program is designed to help you fully develop yourself on a personal and professional level by understanding our end-to-end supply chain processes, including the interdependencies and interconnectedness between different areas. You will gain industry-specific knowledge and leverage the experience of experts in our different locations and Opcos.Who we’re looking for:Academic achievement: Strong technical academic background; Master’s in for example Supply Chain Management, Logistics, Operations Management, Industrial Engineering, Computer Science, Data Analytics or Business Administration.Language: Strong proficiency of business English and local language  Professional experience and passion: Maximum of one to two years of experience in supply chain, business administration or manufacturing environments.Global mobility and adaptability: Eagerness to take on global projects and temporary international relocation opportunities. Flexibility and ability to adapt to different cultures, helping our operations around the world.Proactive learners: Enjoyment in mastering complex concepts and applying learnings in practical ways to make an impact.  Creative problem solvers: Ability to approach challenges creatively, thinking outside the box to find the best solutions.Diversity & inclusion: Appreciation and respect for diverse perspectives and ability to share your own ideas and work inclusively.Collaboration: Strong sense of teamwork. Appreciation for diverse perspectives and working synergistically to achieve collective goals.  Entrepreneurial mindset: Proactive, enterprising spirit that seeks new opportunities for improvement and innovation within the supply chain arena.Why Nutreco? By choosing Nutreco, you’ll help us lead the change towards global sustainable food production, equipped with the best training and mentorship and a spirit of innovation. This program isn’t just about what you can bring to us, but how we can grow together, fostering a culture that sparks entrepreneurial mindset.Local hiring company - home location  You will spend the first six months at your home location (Vietnam) gaining on-the-job experience with a real-life job, learning about key supply chain processes, systems, respective goods and services and dataflows. In parallel, you will also start to develop your personal network in a collaborative environment.Plant and Opco locations After the first six months working from your home location, you will spend several months in some of our international plants and locations. The focus here will be on gaining additional perspectives and learning about the day-to-day operational and strategic challenges. At this point, you may identify potential improvements to help us along in our continuous drive for optimization.YPP Academy Weeks Each rotation starts with a Skills Development Academy week focused on job-specific learning and personal development. You will also meet your fellow global Young Professionals and benefit from a wide range of trainings and events. During all the phases of your traineeship, you will work as part of the Supply Chain team on a challenging position, global project, operational business tasks and attend several training courses. This combination of on-the-job, projects, training and international experience will provide you with excellent skills and give you a solid head start on your career.Step into your futureRecruitment process Submit your application. Interview: Connect with your potential future manager to discuss your aspirations and potential fit. Assessment: Review your values alignment, personality, and ability with Nutreco’s needs. Offer: Join us in Feeding the Future!  For application details and more, visit the Nutreco career site. And be quick – the journey begins soon, and we’re eager to welcome our new cohort of visionaries.  To be eligible, candidates must have completed their Master’s program before the traineeship 1st of October 2024, be willing to undertake regional/international assignments; embody the qualities of collaboration and have an entrepreneurial spirit.

115.company: SẢN XUẤT VÀ THƯƠNG MẠI KỆ SẮT ANT
115.job_description: Giới thiệu: Kệ Sắt ANT tự hào là nhà cung cấp uy tín các loại kệ sắt đa dạng, đáp ứng mọi nhu cầu lưu trữ của bạn. Với đội ngũ chuyên gia giàu kinh nghiệm và dây chuyền sản xuất hiện đại, chúng tôi cam kết mang đến cho khách hàng MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC Phát triển nội dụng quảng cáo trên các kênh social (Facebook, instargram, tiktok, youtube,...) Biên soạn và lên kế hoạch thiết kế nội dung cho công ty. Design hình ảnh truyền thông cho khách hàng. Tham gia xây dựng kế hoạch, đóng góp ý tưởng nội dung. Thực hiện báo cáo tiến độ và kết quả định kỳ. YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC Có khả năng viết . Có kinh nghiệm là một lợi thế. Biết sử dụng phần mềm Ai, Ps, Power Point.... Hiểu biết cơ bản về nền tảng social media đối với ngành hàng, có khả năng viết lách về sản phẩm kệ sắt cũng là một lợi thế. Có Laptop để làm việc. Có khả năng chịu áp lực công việc, sáng tạo, có tinh thần trách nhiệm Đáp ứng thời gian làm việc tối thiểu 6 buổi/tuần từ Thứ 2 - Thứ 6 (được đăng kí thời gian làm việc). QUYỀN LỢI Được training cụ thể về phương pháp viết Content chuẩn, kỹ năng thiết kế hình ảnh, cách viết lách hiệu quả. Môi trường làm việc thân thiện, hoà đồng. Được hỗ trợ dấu mộc xác nhận thực tập. Được hỗ trợ đào tạo khóa học chuyên sâu về Digital Marketing (Facebook Ads, Google Ads,..). Có cơ hội thăng tiến thành partner chính thức. Được đăng kí lịch làm linh hoạt theo lịch học. - Hồ sơ yêu cầu: Sơ yếu lý lịch (được xác nhận bởi công an ở địa phương); Đơn xin việc; Bằng photo bằng tốt nghiệp trung cấp, cao đẳng, đại học; Giấy khai sinh và giấy khám sức khỏe của mẹ; 02 ảnh 3×4, chứng minh nhân dân (photo). Chứng chỉ văn bằng khác (nếu có); Bản tóm tắt quá trình học tập, kinh nghiệm công tác tại đơn vị cũ. Địa điểm làm việc: TPHCM Lương: 2000K - 4000K VND một tháng Loại hình công việc: Thỏa thuận thời gian  Yêu cầu: Quyền lợi: Thưởng Tháng 13, Đào Tạo Miễn Phí Hạn nộp: 2024-09-27 Kinh nghiệm: Không yêu cầu kinh nghiệm làm việc Bằng cấp: Không yêu cầu Lĩnh vực: Bán hàng, Kinh Doanh -Marketing Số lượng cần tuyển: 1 Giới tính: Không yêu cầu

116.company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN NƯỚC HOÀNG MINH
116.job_description: Số lượng: 1 người Mô tả công việc  Thiết kế các ấn phẩm quảng cáo trên kênh Digital marketing (Website, Facebook, Youtube,...) như banner flash, popup, hình ảnh cho bài viết SEO, banner/cover/avatar/post trên fanpage, edit video,... Thiết kế các ấn phẩm in (tờ rời, brochure, poster, bandroll, v.v..)Thiết kế các vật phẩm sử dụng trong ngày lễ, sự kiện (backdrop, giấy mời, standee, bảng biển, v.v…) Xử lý, chỉnh sửa, biên tập và dựng video về quảng cáo, các đoạn giới thiệu, các sản phẩm truyền thông, hình động; video daily... trên các kênh online và ofline của công ty bao gồm website, fanpage, social media,... Quay phim, dựng phim: Quay phim, dựng phim theo ý tưởng và kịch bản đã được duyệt, đảm bảo chất lượng hình ảnh, âm thanh và nội dung của video.. Hỗ trợ các công việc khác trong team Marketing.  Yêu cầu  Tốt nghiệp Đại Học chuyên ngành Marketing, truyền hình, thiết kế đồ họa… Có kinh nghiệm ít nhất 01 năm ở vị trí tương đương. Biết sử dụng thành thạo công cụ AI, Psd, các phần mềm chỉnh sửa video như Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects,… Có kiến thức và kỹ năng về quay phim, dựng phim, xử lý hình ảnh, âm thanh,...Có khả năng sáng tạo, tư duy logic, óc thẩm mỹ tốt. Có tinh thần trách nhiệm, chịu được áp lực công việc. Có khả năng làm việc độc lập và phối hợp nhóm tốt.  Quyền lợi được hưởng  Lương từ 11 triệu (thỏa thuận) + Thưởng KPI Được tham gia đào tạo chuyên môn, kỹ năng mềm, các hoạt động ngoại khóa, team building,...; Hưởng đầy đủ các quyền lợi của NLĐ theo Luật Lao động  Địa điểm làm việc VPC: 64 Phổ Quang, Phường 02, Q, Tân Bình, TP.HCM Cách thức ứng tuyển: nộp hồ sơ qua email: hanhchinh@ionlife.com.vn gồm CV và 3 sản phẩm hoặc dự án thiết kế đã làm.  Lưu ý: Ứng viên mang theo hồ sơ photo khi đi phỏng vấn, phỏng vấn không đạt không trả lại hồ sơ.  Ưu tiên ứng viên nộp hồ sơ sớm, phỏng vấn đạt nhận việc ngay!

117.job_description: No. 25, Riverview 6, Vinhomes Goldern River, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, Technopark Tower, Hanoi, Vietnam  Research Scientist in Machine Learning  Machine Learning (ML) group at VinAI is seeking highly qualified people for the position of Vietnam–based Research Scientist in ML. As a member of the team, you will work on some of the most challenging problems, develop novel ML solutions, and collaborate with research scientists, residents and research engineers to integrate your ideas into products.  WHAT YOU’LL DO Conduct cutting-edge research in machine learning and deep learning related to (but not limited to): generative AI (GenAI), representation learning, optimal transport, domain generalization, unsupervised learning, self–supervised learning, weakly–supervised learning, and reinforcement learning. Publish scientific papers in top–tier conferences on ML such as NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, AISTATS. Collaborate with other lab members and visitors to develop solutions for real-world, large-scale problems. WHAT YOU’LL NEED  Required Qualifications: PhD in Computer Science or related technical fields. Experience in Machine Learning, Algorithmic Foundations of Optimization or Machine Intelligence (Artificial Intelligence). Experience in C, C++, Python. Contributions to world–class research, including publishing papers in world–leading ML venues (NeurIPS, ICML, ICRL, AISTATS).  Preferred Qualifications  1. Relevant work experience, including full-time academia/industry experience or as a researcher in a lab 2. Strong publication record, especially on GenAI 3. Ability to design and execute on research agenda 4. Research activities: The machine learning (ML) group is currently focusing on many of the most studied machine learning topics involving Fundamental ML for GenAI, Representation Learning, Optimal Transport, Meta–learning, Domain Adaptation, Domain Generalization, Active Learning, Bayesian Inference as well as their appropriate connections/combinations. Our research activities mainly include:  Investigating novel solutions for a wide variety of the most challenging problems in machine learning. Collaborating with other VinAI teams (e.g., Computer Vision, NLP, Applied) to integrate research ideas into products. Collaborating with world–class researchers from all over the world in doing research on the related topics above Organizing a weekly reading group: To explore, discuss relevant state–of–the–art work. Publishing research papers at top–tier conferences on AI/ML including NeurIPS, ICML, UAI, ICLR, AISTATS, AAAI. WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORK HERE Opportunity to apply your knowledge and research skills to make real impact to the world. Compensation is highly competitive and will consider the applicant’s current experience level Work on challenging real–world problems. Opportunity to continuously grow your knowledge and your leadership skills Opportunity to contribute, interact, share and learn from exceptionally talented colleagues  Join us in cultivating a culture of continuous learning and professional growth at VinAI. Apply now and contribute to our employees’ development journey!  Contact: Interested applicants are invited to send your application to job@vinai.io  Interested applicants are invited to send your application to job@vinai.io

118.job: Data Analytics Senior Specialist (Chuyên viên Cấp cao Phân tích Dữ liệu)
118.job_description: Prudential’s purpose is to be partners for every life and protectors for every future. Our purpose encourages everything we do by creating a culture in which diversity is celebrated and inclusion assured, for our people, customers, and partners. We provide a platform for our people to do their best work and make an impact to the business, and we support our people’s career ambitions. We pledge to make Prudential a place where you can Connect, Grow, and Succeed. This role is business intelligence/data analyst role to be a key part of PVA’s ambition of transforming into a data-led organization (going from descriptive to predictive analytics, going from hindsight to insight and foresight) both in planning and execution. Harness the data generated from sales and transactions to 1.5 million existing customers, 2 millions policies and from activity of hundred thousands of sales agents, develop insights that can be translated into actions that drive business growth at different areas (Agency/Partnership Distribution, Product Development, Operations, Customer service, Fraud detection, etc.)Job ResponsibilitiesBUSINESS DECISION MAKING SUPPORTS:1. Ensure decision makers (incl. top management & business teams) to have visibility on business performance on-time and at good quality2. Ensure all data products3. Provide advice to business teams for System design/Process Enhancement4. Master the data structures and processing rules for the assigned function(s)5. Prepare & review periodic report/ dashboard (monthly, weekly, daily…) and ad-hoc requests to support the business stakeholders for the assigned functions & ensure data accuracy and timeliness delivery6. Actively look for areas of potential simplification/ automation and implement these changes7. Verify and document data rules, data dictionary so that it is well-maintained & updated8. Continuously upgrade data processing & visualization skill sets to catch up with new technology, new strategy ON PROJECT-BASED (FOR NEW REQUESTS – DASHBOARD OR ANALYSIS1. Understand the assigned function(s)’ specific goals, challenges & opportunities.2. Build dashboard/ Deep-dive analysis3. Support local/ regional data scientists to build predictive models/ advanced analytics workOTHERS:Share knowledge to other team members Other tasks assigned by managers Job Accountability  Successfully building and delivering the assigned reports/ dashboards,  Successfully building contest performance meeting high TAT, Accuracy and Quality, reportingJob RequirementsQualifications Degree in Business, Mathematics, Statistics, Engineering, Computer Science or other Quantitative discipline  Experience Min 2-3 years of solid experience in business intelligence/ business analytics  Knowledge and skill Ability to interpret data and translate them into actionable insights Knowledge of statistical Skilled in SQL and Excel, Power Bi (mandatary) Familiarity with one of the programming language R/Python is a plus Inherently curious about data with a strong desire to keep up to date with the latest developments in analytics Attention to details (mandatary) Critical thinking Can-do attitude Decent communication skills  CompetenciesLeadership Capability Model – N/APrudential is an equal opportunity employer. We provide equality of opportunity of benefits for all who apply and who perform work for our organisation irrespective of sex, race, age, ethnic origin, educational, social and cultural background, marital status, pregnancy and maternity, religion or belief, disability or part-time / fixed-term work, or any other status protected by applicable law. We encourage the same standards from our recruitment and third-party suppliers taking into account the context of grade, job and location. We also allow for reasonable adjustments to support people with individual physical or mental health requirements.

119.job_description: Who are we? Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7,600 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.  At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:Brief Call: Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!Interviews (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!Case study: Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.  We look forward to meeting you!  Job description  ABOUT THE JOB  Collect, analyze, and interpret data from various sources to provide insights for business decisions. Conduct full lifecycle analysis, including requirements, activities, and design. Develop analysis and reporting capabilities and monitor performance and quality control plans for improvements. Engage with stakeholders to understand business problems and formulate data-driven approaches for resolution. Master data structures and processing rules for the assigned function(s). Visualize data using reporting/dashboard tools and techniques, ensuring availability, quality, and accuracy of reporting. Identify areas for potential simplification/automation and implement these changes. Document and follow existing processes for reporting and data quality management. Continuously research and improve to become a subject matter expert on data repositories and analytic solutions. Communicate effectively with non-technical/technical peers and provide ad-hoc data and analytics support to the business.  ABOUT YOU  Bachelor’s degree in information technology, computer science, or a related field. 2+ years of experience in data analytics working closely with business functions. Proficiency in Microsoft Excel, SQL, ETL tools, and Visualization tools. Experience with Power BI, Azure Synapse, Azure Analysis Services, Azure Data Factory, Azure Fabric, and Azure Open AI is a plus. Experience with Python/R programming is a plus. Inherent curiosity about data with a strong desire to keep up to date with the latest developments in analytics, visualization, and machine learning. Ability to communicate with non-technical/technical peers.  Benefits  13th-month salary 14+ annual leaves per year Premium healthcare insurance, starting from your probation period Project reviews and yearly performance appraisals Annual company trips Teambuilding activities: Team lunch/dinner, events, and celebrations, sports clubs (football, yoga, badminton, etc.) International team with flexible working time + hybrid working Tailor-made career path Technical workshops and training courses Mobility: Opportunities to be on-site abroad in our offices in over 60+ countries  Equal Opportunity  Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal-opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.

120.company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Đầu Tư Sài Gòn High Rise
120.job_description: Mô tả công việc: (Mức lương: 15 - 20 triệu VNĐ)Chịu trách nhiệm thực hiện xử lý các hạng mục liên quan đếnhình ảnh, thiết kế (Nhận diện thương hiệu, hình ảnh, video, ...) phục vụ công tác truyền thông dự án. Trao đổi/ làm việc trực tiếp và theo dõi đôn đốc tiến độ thực thi của đối tác/ đơn vị thực thi sản phẩm truyền thông, agency sản xuất. Nghiên cứu, đề xuất kế hoạch thiết kế quảng cáo, các chương trình quảng cáo ngoài trời để thúc đẩy bán hàng và xây dựng thương hiệu (brochure, flyer, poster, banner, standee). Lên ý tưởng thiết kế các vật phẩm, mẫu quảng cáo theo yêu cầu. Phác thảo các thông điệp quảng cáo,đóng góp ý kiến xây dựng các sản phẩm truyền thông phù hợp với tiêu chí công ty đề ra. Triển khai các kế hoạch thiết kế quảng cáo được duyệt. Quản lý các nhà cung ứng dịch vụ (agency) về thiết kế quảng cáo. Phối hợp với team marketing để đảm bảo các thiết kế đáp ứng mục tiêu truyền thông Nghiên cứu xu hướng thiết kế mới trong lĩnh vực bất động sản để áp dụng vào công việcChức vụ: Nhân viên/Chuyên viên  Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian  Quyền lợi được hưởng:  Mức lương thỏa thuận, cạnh tranh, phù hợp với năng lực Được đóng BHXH, BHYT, BHTN đầy đủ theo quy định của pháp luật Thưởng các ngày lễ tết, thưởng theo hiệu quả công việc và các phúc lợi khác theo quy chế của Công ty. Có cơ hội thăng tiến trong công ty Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, năng động, nhiều cơ hội học hỏi Được tham gia các hoạt động team building, du lịch hàng nămYêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Trung cấp - Nghề  Yêu cầu công việc:  Học vấn: Tốt nghiệpcử nhân Kinh nghiệm: Có2-3 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí tương đương. Kỹ năng:  Biết sử dụng các tính năng cơ bản tin học văn phòng Sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ đồ họa chuyên ngành (Photoshop, AI, Corel, Indesign, After Effects) trong công việc. Tiếp nhận thông tin, tổng hợp, phân tích, nhận định tốt. Trình bày, thuyết phục và giao tiếp tốt. Khả năng làm việc nhóm, chịu áp lực cao. Có khả năng tư duy sáng tạo, thẩm mỹ tốt  Có kinh nghiệm về lĩnh vực bất động sản là một lợi thếYêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ  Ngành nghề: Adobe Photoshop,Thiết Kế,Thiết Kế 2DTrung cấp - Nghề  Không yêu cầu

121.job_description: HCL Vietnam Company LimitedLevel 11, Five Star Tower, 28Bis Mac Dinh Chi Street, Da Kao Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh  Hybrid Posted 1 day agoSkills: Python DevOps Cloud Top 3 reasons to join us  Attractive Salary and Performance Bonus Health Care for Employees & Family, 18 paid leaves Chance to travel onsite (in 53 countries)  Job descriptionAt ANZ Plus, our purpose is to shape a world where people and communities thrive. We are making this happen by improving our customers’ financial wellbeing so they can achieve incredible things – be it buying a home, building a business, or saving for things big or small. We are looking for people who are passionate about transformational change and to help us redefine banking for the future. Be a part of building the ideal data and ML/AI ecosystem from scratch. Spearhead the integration of the latest capabilities to enhance customer experiences and transform business operations. Embrace the vision of democratizing ML/AI technology, making it accessible to all by establishing robust engineering standards, simplifying complexities, and designing effective controls and guardrails. This leadership role goes beyond conventional boundaries, empowering you to lead and innovate across many aspects of our data enablement value stream. What will your day look like Your role as an MLOps Engineer will be similar to DevOps engineer, with stretched focus on productionizing Machine Learning features.Design and implement scalable AI solutions that enables data engineers and ML scientists to train, build and maintain machine learning models effectively. Develop automated processes for continuous model training and evaluation pipelines specifically for ML applications. Ensure the seamless integration of ANZ Plus’s current architecture with newly added ML functionalities, enhancing overall system capabilities. Collaborating with diverse stakeholders including business partners, risk, legal and security teams, as well as UX designers and architects to define and implement robust validation and verification strategies Fostering a culture of quality coding practices, including test-driven development, unit testing and secure coding awareness Focus on business practicality and the 80/20 rule, aiming for high bar for code quality, but recognize the business benefit of "having something now" vs "perfection sometime in the future"  Your skills and experienceTo grow and be successful in this role, you will bring extensive analytical and technical skills, business acumen and natural curiosity to deliver on product investigations and analysis and support initiatives through insights. You will ideally bring the following:Proficiency in one of the scripting/programming languages (Python). Experience in building data products using GCP/ AWS technologies such . Experience with containerization, Terraform, and GitOps principles for automation and deployment. Strong background in ML concepts and applications and in-depth knowledge of MLOps best practices. Agile development mindset, appreciating the benefit of constant iteration and improvement Have experience of addressing Tech Debt with minimizing production incidents Familiarity with RAG architectures and/or have a good understanding of its application You’re not expected to have 100% of these skills. At ANZ a growth mindset is at the heart of our culture, so if you have most of these things in your toolbox, we’d love to hear from you.  Why you'll love working here  18 paid leaves/year (12 annual leaves and 6 personal leaves) Insurance plan based on full salary + 13th month salary + Performance bonus Meal allowance of 730,000 VND/month 100% full salary and benefits as an official employee from the 1st day of working Medical benefit for employee and family Working in a fast-paced, flexible, and multinational working environment. Chance to travel onsite (in 53 countries) Free snacks, refreshment, and parking Internal training (Technical & Functional & English) Working time: 8:30 AM - 6:00 PM from Mondays to Fridays Why join ANZ? Our purpose is to shape a world where people and communities thrive. That's why we strive to create balanced, sustainable economy in which everyone can take part and build a better life. By helping people make the most of what they have, we transform ideas, hard work and ambition into reality. Career development means different things to different people. It may simply mean developing a skill, broadening your experience by moving sideways or stretching yourself by moving to a different business. How you manage and develop your career is up to you, but ANZ is committed to helping you do this by providing you with the support, tools and resources you need.  ANZ recognises the value of an inclusive and diverse work environment. We take pride in the diversity of our people and encourage applications from diverse candidates. Our recruitment decisions are based on the key inherent needs and requirements of each role, and candidates are selected based on their unique strengths and characteristics. We work flexibly at ANZ. Talk to us and let us know how this role can be flexible for you. Please Note: After your initial application you may be asked to complete an online assessment, this invite will be sent to you via email from our assessment partner SHL. Please action this request as early as possible, this will enable us to manage your application and provide you with an update in a timely manner. HCL Vietnam Company Limited  We bring together the best of technology and our people to supercharge progress.Company type IT OutsourcingCompany industry  Software Development Outsourcing Company size 501-1000 employeesCountryIndia  Working days Monday - FridayOvertime policy No OT

126.job: Field Data Collection Enumerator, Viet Nam/Thailand
126.job_description: Preferred by Nature is conducting field data collection work in Tay Ninh (Vietnam), and Buri Ram, Surin, Khon Kaen (Thailand). We are currently looking for enumerators to collect data from rubber farmers in the area.  What you can expect: As an Enumerator, you will be responsible for collecting reliable and high-quality data from rubber farmers and dealers. Your duties will include conducting daily field visits, accurately recording data, and adhering to the established guidelines and protocols. You will also participate in coordination meetings with the Team Coordinator and provide regular updates on your progress to ensure daily targets are met.  Responsibilities  Conduct field-visit to collect data from farmers using traceability mobile apps. The data includes polygon mapping of farmer’s plantation, fill in questionnaire, and coordinate mapping for facilities and infrastructures such as school, hospitals, etc. Work with rubber traders and support their adoption of the tool. Achieve daily target of up to 5 farmers data per day, equal to 429 farmers data in total of 4,5 months. Communicate regularly with the Team Coordinator, reporting challenges and providing updates on data collection activities. Important that you:  Have a high school diploma or bachelor’s degree in relevant field (e.g., a degree in agriculture, environmental science, geography, or related fields is preferred. Fresh graduates are welcome. Prior experience in data collection, field surveys, or agricultural research is desirable. Understanding of the local geography, culture, and agricultural practices in the target regions (Tay Ninh Province in Vietnam and Buri Ram, Surin, Kon Khaen Province in Thailand). Based in the target regions are preferred. Must own a reliable motorbike to travel to various field locations independently. Must possess a functional mobile phone capable of running data collection applications and maintaining regular communication with the team. Strong interpersonal skills to effectively communicate with farmers, dealers, and team members. Ability to conduct interviews and gather qualitative data. Ability to travel to remote areas and work in challenging field conditions. Willingness to work outdoors for extended periods.  If this sounds like you, we would love to hear from you!What Sets Us Apart:  Competitive salary commensurate with experience and qualifications. Opportunity to work with leading international organizations in the field of sustainability and agriculture. Exposure to best practices and advanced methodologies in data collection and field research. Hands-on experience in fieldwork, providing valuable skills and knowledge. Networking opportunities with professionals and experts in the industry. Collaboration with a dedicated and experienced team. Continuous support and guidance from team leaders and project managers.  Preferred by Nature Preferred by Nature is a non-profit, mission driven organisation that works for sustainable land management and climate-friendly solutions. With 300+ employees and a network of local experts, we develop practical solutions to drive positive impacts in production landscapes and supply chains in 100+ countries. We focus on forest and climate impact commodities and related sectors.  How to apply: If you feel you meet the requirements of the role, please submit your CV and cover letter including salary expectations by 10 September 2024 via the application form below. Application pre-screening will be conducted during the application period. Preferred by Nature wishes our staff to reflect the diversity of society and thus welcomes applications from all qualified candidates regardless of personal background.For questions, please contact: Hilma Lahay hsl@pbn.org

127.job: TRỢ LÝ ĐÀO TẠO 1-ALL STARS FULLTIME
127.job_description: Giới thiệu: Tiền thân là 1 trong những công ty sản xuất phim hàng đầu ​Việt Nam từ 2015, chúng tôi hiểu rằng video và phim ảnh là ​cách tốt nhất để giải trí và ảnh hưởng đến khán giả. Nhưng ​ngày nay ai cũng phải thay đổi cách tiếp cận khi NHÀ SÁNG ​TẠO NỘI DUNG (Creators) là nguồn trực tiếp tự tạo ra nội ​dung (CONTENTS) để GIAO TIẾP (COMMUNICATION) với ​khán giả.Vì vậy, 1-ALL STARS cung cấp 1 nền tảng thương mại hóa ​để tìm kiếm, ươm mầm và hỗ trợ các Nhà Sáng Tạo Nội ​Dung và Tài Năng tiềm năng để ai Nội dung công việcTrợ giảng quản lý lớp học: sắp lịch học,liên hệ giảng viên, điểm danh, nhắc nhở học viện đi học, điều phối giờ giấc học/giờ giấc nghỉ giải lao, chuẩn bị tài liệu lớp học, ghi nhận feedback… Trả lời thắc mắc học viên, người đăng ký học.. Tư vấn học viên trực tiếp khoá học tại công ty, qua hotline và các trang social Tìm kiếm/Soạn hay tự quay chụp nội dung đăng bài quảng bá khoá học và trực trang social của công ty mỗi ngày Phụ trách các chương trình quảng bá cho khoá học: workshop, hay livestream, hay webminar. Phối hợp với các phòng ban khác (phòng tài chính, phòng admin...khi cần thiết) để tổ chức các sự kiện này Xem xét các kế hoạch chạy quảng cáo Facebook Ads/TIktok Ads/giám sát kết quả hằng ngày và đề xuất hành động cụ thể với giám đốc chương trình để kết quả quảng cáo hiệu quả: ít tiền và tuyển được đủ học viên.  Yêu cầuKhông yêu cầu kinh nghiệm. Phù hợp với các bạn tốt nghiệp hoặc sinh viên định hướng theo ngành truyền thông, social, quản lý nghệ sĩ, sân khấu điện ảnh... giúp tạo dựng connection mảng phim, diễn viên. Hướng phát triển mảng quản lý nghệ sĩ hoặc quản lý xây dựng mảng đào tạo KOL/KOC/Influencer. Có ngoại hình, có khả năng giao tiếp Kỹ năng mềm: Giao tiếp, Siêng năng, chịu được áp lực công việc, kỹ năng quản lý thời gian tốt. Kỹ năng quản lý, sắp xếp thời gian - quản lý giảng viên/lớp học. Kỹ năng giao tiếp, teamwork. Kỹ năng: quay/chụp hình cho social bằng điện thoại, chỉnh ảnh/dựng phim bằng điện thoại... Kinh nghiệm: sử dụng Excel, thiết kế Canva, power Point, Word, Tiktok, Capcut, phần mềm chỉnh ảnh trên điện thoại... Google doc - Google calendar – Email Có máy tính laptop và điện thoại smartphone có thể quay chụp tối thiểu chuẩn FullHD.  Quyền lợiThưởng KPIs từ 5-10% tổng doanh thu khoá học. Chia hoa hồng nếu kêu gọi được đối tác tài trợ, nhãn hàng quảng cáo. Được học các khoá đào tạo của công ty nếu cam kết làm việc tối thiểu 1 năm. Phụ cấp nếu làm thêm các dự án quay chụp/dự án Tiktok series hay nhãn hàng.  Địa điểm làm việc: TPHCM Lương: 6000K - 12000K VND một tháng Loại hình công việc: Thỏa thuận thời gian  Yêu cầu: Quyền lợi: Chế độ bảo hiểm, Cơ Hội Thăng Tiến, Hoa hồng Hạn nộp: 2024-09-07 Kinh nghiệm: Không yêu cầu kinh nghiệm làm việc Bằng cấp: Trung cấp Lĩnh vực: Bán hàng, Kinh Doanh -Tư vấn - CSKH;Dịch vụ -Giáo dục, Đào tạo;Hành chính/ Nhân sự -Hành chính/ Văn phòng Số lượng cần tuyển: 2 Giới tính: Không yêu cầu

128.job_description: Attractive benefits We are expanding bussiness and people to meet our clients' demands. You are warmly welcomed to join our team, where you got attractive benefits to support your daily performance. OUR BENEFITS You’ll have a rewarding career We believe success should be rewarded and we believe there is always room to grow. When you join Orient, you begin a career path that can take you to amazing places. You’ll work with cutting-edge technology and use the most advanced methodologies. You’ll become a highly-skilled, highly-experienced professional. And you’ll always find new and challenging opportunities at Orient.You’ll work with great people We believe in the power of teamwork and we believe together all things are possible. At Orient, your teammates will be smart, experienced, and kind. They’ll be world-class engineers, expert testers, and brilliant developers. They’ll help you learn new skills, and they’ll support you when you need help. Your clients will be diverse and interesting — you’ll work with many foreign clients on long-lasting projects. You’ll have a chance to build strong relationships and positive references.You’ll have fun We believe happy people do the best work and we believe happy people are free people. You’re free to be yourself at Orient. We don’t expect you to fit a certain mold, or to have a certain background. We want free-thinkers and dreamers people who believe they can change the world.  Responsibilities:  Operation (70%):Manage general operations, including leading and managing high-performing Software Developers and Quality Engineers. Work with the CIO, Enterprise Architect, Head of Developer Platform, Head of Technology Operations, and Head of Software Engineers to ensure consistency. Participate in a direct collaborative effort with the COO to drive project strategies aimed at delivering value to the client. Track team progress, identify potential risks and issues, and implement appropriate mitigation measures. Coordinate and communicate with stakeholders, ensuring effective and timely communication. Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and industry best practices. Foster a collaborative and positive team environment, promoting effective teamwork and communication. Train and coach by leading by example to all members to build up a Healthy Agile Working Environment Support and coach team leaders on how to structure performance improvement plans and effectively discuss improvement areas with employees. Foster a positive and inclusive work culture by promoting employee engagement initiatives. Works closely with management and employees to improve work relationships, build morale, and increase productivity and retention.  Technical (30%):Stay abreast of new technologies and best practices in software development. Inspire technical excellence by setting and enforcing coding standards and best practice development methodologies.Requirements:  Must have:Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Finance, Economics or a related field. Have a strong knowledge of project management methodologies and tools, with a deep understanding of Scrum, Nexus, Nexus+, and Scrum@Scale principles. Experience in leading and motivating high-performing, full-stack software engineering teams. Communicate effectively and confidently with internal and external stakeholders at all levels Demonstrate ability to work effectively in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. Have a proven record of managing a team of 50+ headcounts. English Proficiency: Equivalent to IELTS Overall Band Score - 6.5 (Speaking and Listening >7.0) Display proficiency in Microsoft Office, coupled with adept problem-solving skills rooted in data analysis. Demonstrate a proven track record in proactively resourcing and coordinating project resources with a focus on effective build-up, plan, and allocation.  Nice to have:Understand budget principles and ability to manage project budgets effectively. Have PSM II certification preferred. Possess a technical background. Exposure to application development in Angular, C#, .NET, and Azure preferred. Indicate impressive proficiency in Power BI and a strong foundation in data-driven skills.  What we offer:Attractive salary based on your performance.  Annual 13th month salary.  Dedication bonus will be paid once a year.  Yearly salary review based on performance.  Premium healthcare insurance, Annual health checks up.  Hybrid working (1-day WFH per week).  Onsite opportunity in Australia. Breakfast are available at the office in the early morning and snacks in the late afternoon. Team building allowance. Annual Company team building trip. Clubs (Football, Badminton, Biking, Running, Music band). Exclusive training programs for all staff in technical, soft skills and process. English class. Technical clubs. Marriage allowance, having newborn baby allowance, bereavement allowance.

129.job_description: LOGIX TECHNOLOGY is a distinguished software services company, specializing in the provision of professional software development services, fostering strong partnerships through the establishment of offshore development centers, offshore product development, and software testing with an infrastructure-oriented approach. We excel at simplifying and enhancing offshore outsourcing, not only by delivering innovative solutions to meet our clients’ exact requirements through high-performance teams but also by significantly contributing to our clients’ success by reducing time-to-market and improving quality. At LOGIX TECHNOLOGY, we are committed to delivering the highest level of professional excellence and making a significant impact in the software development sector. If you are a dedicated professional looking to join a dynamic team working with global leaders, we encourage you to explore the exciting opportunities that await you with us.  LOGIX TECHNOLOGY is looking for a talented Data Engineer with experience on projects using Azure data services and frameworks. The selected candidate will play a key role on our Implementation Services team by creating and supporting secure, performant, and compliant data processing pipelines, databases, and data warehouses that form the central core of client’s innovative software and analytics product offerings.  Job Description  Work with disparate datasets and technologies, integrating them into data warehouse structures suitable for use in our business analytics and data science solutions. Develop solutions in DataLake and Fabric infrastructure to support data modeling and migration to existing applications. Guide discussions with clients on data quality issues and data cleaning activities needed for successful data migration. Work within a sprint-based agile environment to complete tasks across a range of Azure data services and framework. Independently explore and solve complex problems and issues that block key initiatives. Communicate task progress and risks to client’s project management in a timely manner. Leverage your ability to communicate constructively, courteously, and professionally. Learn our business and the specific needs of our clients.  Required Skills & Experience  Minimum 4 years of experience in data engineering roles focusing on designing and developing data integration, storage, and analytics solutions. Experience using ETL/ELT tools and techniques, preferably with Azure Data Factory and other Azure technologies. Proven experience working with data conversion and migration including Microsoft SQL Server, XML, CSV, Access Databases, Microsoft Excel Spreadsheets, and the ability to migrate from new data sources. Working knowledge of Microsoft SQL Server, including creation, maintenance, and debugging of T- SQL scripts and stored procedures. Experience with Azure data solutions for relational data and analytics (Azure SQL and Postgres Databases, Data Lake, Synapse Analytics). Bachelor’s degree in computer science, mathematics, a related field, or equivalent experience.  How You’ll Stand Out  Recent project experience working with Azure data services (Data Factory, Managed SQL, Blob Storage, Databricks or Microsoft Fabric, Synapse, and Power BI). Experience with Python and Jupyter notebook. Experience with code management, change management, and deployment processes. Create, monitor, and maintain critical data ETL pipelines using Azure Data Factory and Azure Functions ensuring functionality, reliability, and high performance.  Benefits & Perks  Attractive Salary & Benefits, full salary in probation. Performance appraisal twice a year, 13th-month salary. Healthcare and incident insurance. 16 Paid Leave days/ year (12 Annual Leave, 02 Summer Leave, 01 Birthday Leave & 01 Christmas Leave). Company trip, annual year-end party, team building activities. Diverse careers opportunities with Software Services, Software Product Development. Working and growing in a value driven, international working environment and standard Agile culture with passionate and talented teams. Various training on hot-trend technologies, best practices, and soft skills. Company trip, big annual year-end party every year, team building, etc. Free in-house entertainment facilities such as football, table football, PS, badminton, trekking…coffee, and snacks (instant noodles, cookies, candies…). Category  Software Development Job Type Full timeLocation  Ho Chi Minh cityExpiration date  21st October 2024

130.job_description: The role of the Beauty & Wellbeing (B&W) Vietnam (VN) R&D Leader is to act as business partner on the Country Leadership team for B&W, Vietnam and look after R&D for Hair Care and Skin Care categories.The role is part of Regional SEA R&D, and will act as key R&D contact for the business. The job holder liaise with the relevant Category R&D Design teams to ensure product technologies are identified and developed in line with business strategy and portfolio plans. Vietnam is a key strategic country for the B&W Category and the R&D Leader will play an important role to drive growth for this market as well as shape the future portfolio for local jewels.  The key job role is to be the R&D lead representative for Vietnam, partnering with the business, and leading the B&W R&D team. Specifically, key roles will include:  Country R&D Representative First point of call for any country activity that requires R&D input Responsible and accountable to deliver agreed total R&D program in the country in close partnership with Region/Global. Resources deployed on innovation agenda through agreed gatekeeping principles, allowing fast tracking of low risk/low complexity projects Work with CCBT to identify opportunities for growth of category and business in VN, and drive creation of new local projects for the pipeline Develop framework for ‘consumer perceived superiority’ that is locally relevant and develop claims packages for key innovations Own and build innovation and claims roadmaps for global & local brands working with CCBT and R&D expertise teams Delivery of all R&D elements OTIF and driving efficiency through the R&D organisation Build interfaces with R&D organisation at Regional/Global to drive ‘One R&D’ mindset and channel appropriate resources to the Country needs Represent R&D on Supply Chain Transformation and 3PM networks, to enable design of appropriate manufacturing systems in line with site master plans Drive Digital agenda for country and region Build best practice for conditioner and other post-wash market development (MDM along with marketing teams to drive category penetration and depth of consumption Be the ‘product expert’ on Hair and Skin care in the VN market, working with influencers and external KOFs to drive messages on Hair fundamentals and UL product portfolio Develop mechanisms to capture local insights/trends and use effectively in creation of comms and MTI (Maximising Technology Impact) assets for different audiences and channels Lead sustainability agenda for B&W in VN by partnering with internal and external stakeholders to develop robust model PCR implementation, recyclable sachets in a circular system Build functional and category expertise along with capabilities in the team in line with Purpose led, Future fit organization principlesThe role is based in HCM and will report to the Regional R&D Head for SEA. Current resources in the team are about 6 FTE. The main accountabilities of the BW R&D VN Leader will cover the following:  Be the voice of product in the Country LT. Help identify new trends and technology opportunities and ensure strong links with design teams Ensure OTIF delivery of R&D elements of agreed total brand innovation plan and agreed 5S saving and simplification plans; own innovation agenda together with Marketing and SC Identify opportunities for outsourcing as appropriate for capacity or capability build R&D partner for ensuring regulatory compliance, issue management, competitor challenges, relevant industry engagement and advocacy Support to Quality and Consumer complaint management where related to design Champion MTI and product activation with consumers and customers. Drive deep channel  understanding and identify relevant growth opportunities using full product portfolio  Lead and manage the R&D team (internal resources), as well as external partners or resources tapped to support the program REQUIREMENTEducation   Graduate or Advanced degree in relevant Science or Technology courses preferred;  FMCG Background and International exposure are a plus  Relevant experience:   Proven track record of driving projects and teams, and delivering with speed to a consistently high standard  Strong leadership, business acumen and influencing abilities  Broad range of R&D experiences across the organization (Global, Cluster/Local) is ideal. Strong exposure and engagement to business teams and cross-functional teams is key.  Additional :   Beauty product lover, someone who is passionate about Beauty and Wellbeing; care about sustainability  Must have very good communication and influencing skills. Must be fluent in English (reading, writing, speaking)  Must show ability to work in a multi-functional, multi-cultural environment  Must be open to occasional travel as needed (e.g. inter-country, international)  Digital and Data skills  Unilever is an organisation committed to equity, inclusion and diversity to drive our business results and create a better future, every day, for our diverse employees, global consumers, partners, and communities. We believe a diverse workforce allows us to match our growth ambitions and drive inclusion across the business. At Unilever we are interested in every individual bringing their ‘Whole Self’ to work and this includes you! Thus if you require any support or access requirements, we encourage you to advise us at the time of your application so that we can support you through your recruitment journey.

131.job_description: Job description  ABOUT THE JOB  Collect, analyze, and interpret data from various sources to provide insights for business decisions. Conduct full lifecycle analysis, including requirements, activities, and design. Develop analysis and reporting capabilities and monitor performance and quality control plans for improvements. Engage with stakeholders to understand business problems and formulate data-driven approaches for resolution. Master data structures and processing rules for the assigned function(s). Visualize data using reporting/dashboard tools and techniques, ensuring availability, quality, and accuracy of reporting. Identify areas for potential simplification/automation and implement these changes. Document and follow existing processes for reporting and data quality management. Continuously research and improve to become a subject matter expert on data repositories and analytic solutions. Communicate effectively with non-technical/technical peers and provide ad-hoc data and analytics support to the business.  ABOUT YOU  Bachelor’s degree in information technology, computer science, or a related field. 2+ years of experience in data analytics working closely with business functions. Proficiency in Microsoft Excel, SQL, ETL tools, and Visualization tools. Experience with Power BI, Azure Synapse, Azure Analysis Services, Azure Data Factory, Azure Fabric, and Azure Open AI is a plus. Experience with Python/R programming is a plus. Inherent curiosity about data with a strong desire to keep up to date with the latest developments in analytics, visualization, and machine learning. Ability to communicate with non-technical/technical peers.  Benefits  13th-month salary 14+ annual leaves per year Premium healthcare insurance, starting from your probation period Project reviews and yearly performance appraisals Annual company trips Teambuilding activities: Team lunch/dinner, events, and celebrations, sports clubs (football, yoga, badminton, etc.) International team with flexible working time + hybrid working Tailor-made career path Technical workshops and training courses Mobility: Opportunities to be on-site abroad in our offices in over 60+ countries  Equal Opportunity  Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal-opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.  Who are we? Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7500 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.  At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:  Brief Call: Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!  Interviews (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!  Case study: Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.  As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience. We look forward to meeting you!

134.job_description: I. MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC  Xây dựng datamark tối ưu trong công tác quản trị dữ liệu hàng ngày; Xây dựng các báo cáo hàng tuần, hàng tháng theo các chỉ số yêu cầu; Phân tích dữ liệu theo các yêu cầu định kỳ/ đột xuất phục vụ việc quản lý rủi ro của Công ty từ các cấp quản lý; Hỗ trợ phòng ban trong việc đánh giá các dự án đang triển khai, chính sách đang áp dụng.  II. YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC  Trình độ  Học vấn: Cử nhân trở lên, tốt nghiệp các ngành liên quan MIS/ information system, Data Science, IT, Business Analyst, Mathematics, Statistics hoặc các ngành tương đương; Ngoại ngữ: Tiếng Anh lưu loát là lợi thế.  Kinh nghiệm  Có từ 2 năm kinh nghiệm phân tích dữ liệu thuộc phòng ban QLRR trong các định chế tài chính hoặc ngân hàng lớn; Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các hệ quản trị CSDL Oracle, MS SQL Server; các công cụ BI như: Tableau, PowerBI, OracleBI; Có kỹ năng phân tích, tổng hợp dữ liệu, sử dụng các ngôn ngữ như: SQL (Mandatory); VBA/Python/R là lợi thế.  Kỹ năng:  Khả năng phân tích, tổng hợp, tư duy logic; Chủ động trong công việc, năng động, nhiệt tình; Kỹ năng làm việc độc lập.  Khác:  Trung thực, thẳng thắn, có tư duy mở, ham học hỏi; Chịu được áp lực cao, có tham vọng phát triển lâu dài với công việc QLRR; Có khả năng thích nghi với môi trường tốt, gắn bó lâu dài với tổ chức; Tuân thủ tuyệt đối các quy định, kỷ luật tốt. Thực hiện những TVC, Trailer, Video Clip theo yêu cầu của cấp trên có tính thẩm mỹ phù hợp Maketing Design dành cho những chiến dịch kinh doanh của công ty. Sử dụng phần mềm chỉnh sửa video để tạo ra sản phẩm cuối cùng một cách chuyên nghiệp. Thực hiện việc chỉnh sửa màu sắc, âm thanh, hiệu ứng đặc biệt và đồ họa chuyển động. Làm việc cùng quản lý để phát triển ý tưởng và kịch bản. Thực hiện quản lý file và lưu trữ đúng cách. Có thể chịu đựng áp lực khi làm việc ở cường độ cao, đúng deadline. Có khả năng làm việc độc lập và làm việc nhóm. Các công việc khác theo sự phân công của cấp trên.  YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC  Ưu tiên Ứng viên tốt nghiệp Cao đẳng/Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành Thiết kế đồ hoạ, Graphic Design hoặc các ngành liên quan khác... Sử dụng tốt các phần mềm thiết kế như: Adobe After Effects và Adobe Premiere Pro Adobe Illustrator (Ai), Adobe Photoshop (Ps), Adobe Indesign (In), Corel trung cấp trở lên... Sáng tạo, có kiến thức tốt về mỹ thuật và khả năng trình bày ý tưởng. Chịu được áp lực về chất lượng và bảo đảm tiến độ công việc, có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao. Nắm bắt nhanh công việc.  QUYỀN LỢI  Gói thu nhập cạnh tranh (thưởng lương tháng 13, thưởng nghỉ mát....). Đầy đủ các chế độ theo luật lao động hiện hành. Chính sách phúc lợi theo quy định của Công ty đa dạng: Chăm sóc sức khỏe định kì hàng năm; Gói bảo hiểm sức khỏe chuyên biệt (FPT Care – Khám chữa bệnh miễn phí tại tất cả các bệnh viện); Các hoạt động tri ân, chăm lo đời sống tinh thần CBNV và Thân nhân ... Môi trường làm việc thân thiện, cởi mở. Cơ sở vật chất và công cụ làm việc hiện đại, tiện nghi. Nhiều cơ hội phát triển và thăng tiến. Văn hóa Doanh nghiệp đặc sắc, sinh động bậc nhất với nhiều các hoạt động hấp dẫn: tân binh, teambuilding, thi trạng, hội làng, hội diễn Sao Chổi, sinh nhật FPT, ngày 08/03, ngày 11/11... Hưởng các gói ưu đãi cước khi sử dụng dịch vụ của FPT Telecom.  Ghi chú: FPT Telecom không thu bất kỳ chi phí nào của Ứng viên, Sinh viên trong quá trình tuyển dụng, thực tập.
